main.name: Joseph Whiteaker
main.description: This is my personal and professional resume website. Currently a new version of a portfolio site is being made using Angular. However, this site does contain up to date professional information and my current resume.
main.bio: Hello! My name is Joseph Whiteaker. I am a sophomore student athlete at Presbyterian College. This is my personal website for my resume!
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact me for anything ( whether that be for employment, a website, or just a question ), then just shoot me an email!

education.description: Majoring in math and in computer science as well. Former D1 FCS Football player for Presbyterian College.

work.title: 2020 Election
work.description: Basic static page website with basic HTML, CSS, JS, & PHP. This website was designed to be a one stop shop for all 2020 election information in South Carolina in a simple and easy to understand format.
